medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented at age 13 with growth retardation that had persisted for 8 years. Symptoms included normal cortisol production initially, but later evaluations indicated hypocortisolism.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Central hypothyroidism, growth hormone deficiency, and ACTH deficiency.
medical_history.family_history: Consanguinity among family members (first cousins) and multiple affected individuals with combined pituitary hormone deficiency.
